As a quick workaround, turn off the new ast evaluation engine in the Debug work 
in progress preference page.

Cannot reproduce in the latest code, but we believe it has been addressed by Bug
12208.

If this was related to bug 12208, adding a carriage return to the end of your
file should eliminate the problem.

If this bug still exists in the 20020402 integration build, please followup with
more information. Specifically, where were you suspended when you performed this
evaluation?
Closing. Cannot be reproduced in current build.
